================================================================

To make dump file
d:\soft\Raven_960\Smuggler\Raven.Smuggler out http://user-pc:8080/  d:\Projects\MIS_Dev\testdata\init.raven.dump

To import from dump file
d:\soft\Raven_960\Smuggler\Raven.Smuggler in http://user-pc:8080/  d:\Projects\MIS_Dev\testdata\init.raven.dump
================================================================

To make dump file
C:\Users\Slava\Desktop\RavenDB-960ES\Smuggler\Raven.Smuggler out http://slava-pc:8080/  D:\Projects\MIS_Dev-event-sourcing\init.raven.dump

To import from dump file
C:\Users\Slava\Desktop\RavenDB-960ES\Smuggler\Raven.Smuggler in http://slava-pc:8080/  D:\Projects\MIS_Dev-event-sourcing\testdata\init.raven.dump

================================================================


1. Start ravenDb server.
2. Exec 
Raven.Smuggler in http://localhost:8081/  init.dump

where: 
Raven.Smuggler  		export\import utility
http://localhost:8080/ 		server path
init.dump 			file of exported db


if you want to update use out command

Raven.Smuggler out http://localhost:8081/  init.dump
